pages.text: Certain devices, such as the $(item)Reaper Generator$() and $(item)Soul Beacon$(), may utilize runes for various effects. Most runes come in both an item form and a block form. Consult the devices' entries, for their purpose.
When in a Reaper Generator, this rune will increase the range at which it may drain from.${br2}When in a Soul Beacon, it will do the same.
When in a Reaper Generator, this rune will allow it to kill as if it were a player, however it loses the capability to generate power.${br2}This rune has no effect in a Soul Beacon.
